mention.text: the reason the remaining crude oil out of the tanker Exxon Valdez in preparation took 11 hours to set the first containment line The worst thing Exxon crews could have done early on was try to boom the vessel Exxon crews would have lost the vessel
Exxon Valdez in preparation for refloating and removing the source of the nation 's worst-ever oil spill The fugitive captain of the Exxon Valdez sent signals The fugitive captain of the Exxon Valdez
The fugitive captain of the Exxon Valdez
The fugitive captain of the Exxon Valdez
the vessel while drunk Meanwhile , Exxon said placing an oil-catching boom around the ship
